summary: Completed comprehensive testing of resource management functionality and project stage dropdown. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all 4 resource types, automatic expense creation, and stage updates working correctly. Frontend displays resources properly with badges and cost information, shows auto-created expenses, and updates budget overview. Minor UI interaction issues with modal overlays in resource form.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting pointer events preventing dropdown interactions
ui_bugs.impact: Users may have difficulty selecting resource types in the form

integration_issues.issue: Stage selector not found with data-testid, but functionality works via alternative selectors

passed_tests: All 14 backend resource management API endpoints (100% success rate)
Resource creation for all 4 types: Team Member, Vendor, Equipment, Material
Cost field logic - hidden for Team Members, visible for Vendors/Equipment/Materials
Automatic expense creation for resources with costs (Vendor: $6000, Equipment: $5000, Material: $500)
Project stage updates for all 6 stages (initiation → planning → execution → monitoring → closing → closed)
Resource display in Resources tab with proper badges and cost information
Budget overview updates reflecting auto-created expenses ($500 spent, $49,500 remaining)
Expenses tab showing auto-created expenses with proper descriptions
Integration between Resources and Expenses tabs
Resource type badges display correctly (equipment, team member)
Cost per unit and quantity calculations display properly
Project stage persistence and API updates

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (resource display and integration working, minor modal interaction issues)

action_item_for_E1: Minor UI improvement needed: Fix modal overlay issue in resource form to improve dropdown interactions. Consider adding force=true or adjusting z-index for better user experience. All core functionality is working correctly.
